doc.title: 3 Hot Tales
doc.plot: all are in a circle of juggling Indian summers a trail of bristly stinking fumes... a crazy looping circle where the sea rises up like a boiling salted soup, for climate change is here a child loses her future and the world seeks revenge in this surreal moral fable, a visual assault as a warning to humanity.
